snippet: Nascar indefinitely banned a driver’s girlfriend from all events for slapping a rival racer after the Truck Series race Sunday in Bowmanville, Ontario.
abstract: Nascar indefinitely bars Kelly Heaphy, girlfriend of driver Mike Skeen, from all events for slapping racer Max Papis, Skeen's rival, after Truck Series race in Bowmanville, Ontario.
lead_paragraph: Nascar indefinitely banned a driver’s girlfriend from all events for slapping a rival racer after the Truck Series race Sunday in Bowmanville, Ontario.

headline.print_headline: Slapping of Driver Leads to Ban
